answers.answer: Same here I think that too. Bt my reason is I m having twins n so in that case they say babies can come any time after 35 weeks

I felt the same way with my 1st I was convinced I would have him at 38 weeks and made it to 40 weeks. Not sure why but a lot of moms feel that way, some end up early others on term and the rest are late.
I am due sept 3rd but since i was probably about 12 weeks or so i've really felt like August 28th is gonna be the date. I too am a ftm so we will see.
From about 25 weeks I had a feeling my boy would arrive early and sure enough I had him last night at 36+2 weeks

I felt that way at first. Even my doctor told me that she might come early because I was having signs of preterm labor. Now here I am at 39 weeks...6 days away from my due date and I'm barely dilated.

I also felt during most of the pregnancy that my little guy would come early...but i only have 8 days till my due date (september 1st...labor day!!) So now i gave up that feeling and it seems he will stay in there forever! Lol ive been 1cm for two weeks and he has dropped very low...but no other signs yet.
I m due October 26 th also n this baby is huge I think he's gonna come a week or two sooner . I m so tired of being asked are you having one or two.
With my first bb i had a feeling he was gonna b 2 weeks early n i was right i stopped working 5 days b4 i had him

Im 33 wks ive been feeling that way, at first my drs thought i would have him before oct 9 bc i had preeclampsia with my daughter at 32 wks but i still haven't had him i had early contractions at 29 and 30 weeks but now im just waiting...
Ivwas also very sure I would have ny baby early. My guess was Aug 8th, due date was Aug 22 and here we are 2 days late and counting... /:

question: Im due October 26th ftm, but for some reason I feel like my baby boy will be making his appearance a week or so early. Anyone else feel like this? I know most ftm go late but the closer I get the more I feel like I'll be getting my pumpkin sooner then later
title: early baby?
